title: Covid: Boris Johnson plans to 'ride out' Omicron wave with no more curbs
content:
1. Covid: Boris Johnson plans to 'ride out' Omicron wave with no more curbs  BBC News
  2. UK to roll out daily COVID-19 testing for 100000 critical workers  Reuters
  3. 100,000 key workers in England told to take Covid test every working day  The Guardian
  4. UK makes omicron contingency plans for hospitals, schools  Fox Business
  5. Whitehall departments consider military help to combat Covid staff shortages  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: コビット：ボリス・ジョンソンは、オミクロンの波を「乗り切る」ことを計画しており、これ以上の抑制はない。
